actions.name: Claws (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.description: DC 10 CON save or take 5 (2d4) poison and be poisoned for 1 minute; repeat save end of turns to end.

actions.name: Scare (1/Day)
actions.description: Creature within 20 ft. makes DC 10 WIS save or frightened for 1 minute (repeat saves end of turns, with disadvantage if quasit is in sight).

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: Turns invisible until it attacks or uses Scare, or loses concentration; equipment becomes invisible too.
